channel.title: Team Bikenetic Bicycle Shorts
channel.description: Team Bikenetic races mountain bike and cyclocross race events in the mid-Atlantic USA. We aim to briefly cover happenings with the team, pointing out other interesting media sources, and quick highlights of things we've come across or are excited about. Public podcast but oriented around team interests and events.
channel.itunes:author: Team Bikenetic
channel.itunes:summary: Team Bikenetic races mountain bike and cyclocross race events in the mid-Atlantic USA. We aim to briefly cover happenings with the team, pointing out other interesting media sources, and quick highlights of things we've come across or are excited about. Public podcast but oriented around team interests and events.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Mountain bike and cyclocross racing in the mid-Atlantic USA

item.title: TB BS #1, race season kicks off
item.description: Quick overview of last week's races, upcoming races and openings in the mid-atlantic area, and a good overview of pro results from Robert.
item.itunes:summary: Quick overview of last week's races, upcoming races and openings in the mid-atlantic area, and a good overview of pro results from Robert.

item.title: TB BS #2, pennsylvania fun
item.description: Quick overview of last week's races, upcoming races and openings in the mid-atlantic area, and recent races in Pennsylvania with Christine Feldt.
item.itunes:summary: Quick overview of last week's races, upcoming races and openings in the mid-atlantic area, and recent races in Pennsylvania with Christine Feldt.

item.title: TB BS #3, mud and waterloo
item.description:
Quick overview of mud and log disasters at SykeloCross with Christine, prime details on our upcoming race BikeneticX, and in-depth coverage of the Trek CX cup with Peter and Robert.
Post-recording edits: We accidentally left out Cara Schultz's 2nd place podium at SykeloCross, and Pete Beer's win in the superb fixed category at 50 Shades of Gravel!
item.itunes:summary:
Quick overview of mud and log disasters at SykeloCross with Christine, prime details on our upcoming race BikeneticX, and in-depth coverage of the Trek CX cup with Peter and Robert.
Post-recording edits: We accidentally left out Cara Schultz's 2nd place podium at SykeloCross, and Pete Beer's win in the superb fixed category at 50 Shades of Gravel!
item.itunes:keywords: sportif series,sykelocross,hyattsville cx,mud,trek cx,cyclocross,super series,bikeneticx,team bikenetic,bikenetic,mid atlantic
